articles.title: North Korea's Kim Yong Chol in US for meeting with Mike Pompeo
articles.description: Former spy chief Kim Yong Chol set to meet top US diplomat as Russia's Lavrov heads to North Korea for talks on Thursday

articles.title: Arkady Babchenko reported killed in Ukraine appears alive
articles.description: Ukrainian Security Service says it staged the Russian journalist's death to catch those who were trying to kill him.

articles.title: 'Poverty, gender bias, conflict threaten 1.2 billion children'
articles.description: Conditions faced by children worsened in 40 countries last year, new Save the Children study says.

articles.title: Quebec mosque attack survivors demand ban on assault weapons
articles.description: Muslim community, still coping with last year's deadly shooting, calls for outright ban on assault rifles in Canada.

articles.author: Linah Alsaafin
articles.title: The legacy of the oldest Palestinian pharmacy in Jaffa
articles.description: El-Kamal Pharmacy, owned by the Geday family, has been a staple of Jaffa's al-Ajami neighbourhood for almost 100 years.

articles.title: Italy's crisis is about to get much worse
articles.description: The Italian president's veto on a proposed populist cabinet will have dire consequences.

articles.title: Libya peace talks: More of the same?
articles.description: Analysts welcome peace talks but caution they could become 'empty promises to please the international community'.

articles.author: Nawal Faisal Aqeel
articles.title: The blockade that unblocked art empowerment in Qatar
articles.description: Amid the Saudi-led blockade on Qatar, national youth used their artistic creativity in defending their country.
